altTitles.en: It's So Sweet When I Marry My Organization's Nemesis
I Married My Organization's Arch-Nemesis, and It's So Sweet!

altTitles.pt-br: É Tão Doce Casar com o Arqui-Inimigo da Minha Organização

altTitles.vi: Thật Ngọt Ngào Khi Kết Hôn Với Kẻ Thù Của Tổ Chức Mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Soshiki no Shukuteki to Kekkon Shitara Mecha Amai

description.en:
"...I hate you!"
"What a coincidence. So do I."

The two once belonged to opposing organisations of supernatural power users, and fought for their own opposing goals. Roushi Saikawa, also known as the "Feather Hunter," and Ritsuka Yanagi, the strongest supernatural power user known as the "White Demon." The two spent their days battling each other and had no normal social experience, but...

"I love you, Rou-kun."
"Me too, Ritsuka."

After their organisation was disbanded, they somehow started dating and then got married! Is their hatred 100 times more adorable? Now, they are the epitome of a lovey-dovey couple, kissing each other at the door every morning when they go to work. But the husband had just one problem. That is, he had never shared a bed with his wife... In other words, even though he was married, he was still a virgin! This is the story of the hardships faced by such a husband, who gets caught up in numerous troubles but continues to make desperate attempts to deepen his love with his strict wife.
description.ja:
「……大っ嫌い！」
「奇遇だな。おれもだ」

　かつて敵対する異能力者の組織に属し、反目し合う目的のために抗争を繰り広げていた二人。
　《羽根狩り》の異名を持つ犀川狼士(さいがわろうし)と、《白魔》と呼ばれる最強の異能力者・柳良律花(なぎらりつか）。
　血で血を洗う毎日を過ごし、まともな社会経験のない二人だったが……

「ろうくん、大好きっ」
「俺もだよ、律花」

　組織解散後はなぜかイチャコラ付き合った上に結婚していた！
　憎さ余って可愛さ100倍？　いまや、毎朝会社に行く際に玄関で「いってらっしゃい」のチューをするくらいバカップルを地で行く夫婦。
　だが夫にはただひとつだけ悩みがあった。
　それは、妻と一度も寝床を共にしたことがないということ……要するに彼は既婚者なのにいまだ童貞であったのだ！
　これはそんな夫が数々のトラブルに巻き込まれながらも、
　身持ちのお堅い妻との愛を深めるため、今日も必死にアプローチを続ける艱難辛苦の物語である。
description.vi:
…. “ta ghét ngươi!”

“trùng hợp thay, tôi cũng vậy”

   Hai người họ từng thuộc hai tổ chức đối địch của những người sử dụng dị năng, và chiến đấu vì những mục đích trái ngược nhau.

       Saikawa Roushi, còn được gọi với cái tên là “thợ săn lông vũ”, và Yanagi Rikka, người sử dụng dị năng mạnh nhất được biết đến với cái tên “bạch ma”. Cả hai đã dành cả ngày để chiến đấu với nhau nên họ không có kinh nghiệm xã hội bình thường nào, thế nhưng…

 “em yêu anh, Rou-kun.”

“anh cũng yêu em. Rikka.”

  Sau khi tổ chức bị tan rã, bằng cách nào đó họ đã bắt đầu hẹn hò và đi đến kết hôn! Có phải sự thù hận của họ đáng yêu gấp 100 lần không? Giờ đây, họ là hình ảnh thu nhỏ của một cặp đôi yêu nhau say đắm, hôn nhau mỗi sáng trước khi đi ra ngoài.

  Nhưng người chồng có một vấn đề khá lớn, Đó là anh chưa bao giờ được ngủ chung giường với vợ mình… Nói cách khác, mặc dù đã kết hôn nhưng anh vẫn còn trinh! Đây là câu chuyện về những khó khăn mà người chồng phải đối mặt, dù vướng vào vô số rắc rối vẫn tiếp tục cố gắng để vun đắp tình yêu với người vợ nghiêm khắc của mình.
description.pt-br:
**Eu Te Odeio, Mas Também Te Amo**  

“...Eu te odeio!”  
“Que coincidência. Eu também.”  

Roushi Saikawa, conhecido como o "Caçador de Plumas", e Ritsuka Yanagi, a usuária de poderes sobrenaturais mais forte, apelidada de "Demônio Branco", pertenciam a organizações rivais que batalhavam por objetivos opostos. Durante anos, viveram enfrentando-se ferozmente, sem tempo para experiências sociais comuns.  

Mas agora…  

“Eu te amo, Rou-kun.”  
“Eu também, Ritsuka.”  

Depois que suas organizações foram desmanteladas, os dois, de alguma forma, começaram a namorar e acabaram se casando! Será que o ódio deles se tornou 100 vezes mais fofo? Hoje, eles são a personificação de um casal apaixonado, trocando beijos na porta todas as manhãs antes de irem trabalhar.  

No entanto, Roushi tinha um problema: ele nunca tinha dividido a cama com sua esposa. Em outras palavras, mesmo casado, ainda era virgem! Esta é a história das dificuldades de um marido dedicado, que enfrenta diversas confusões enquanto tenta desesperadamente fortalecer o amor com sua rígida e poderosa esposa.

I Am the Beloved Daughter of the Devil
The Devil's Beloved Daughter

description.en:
Mia Evelan has never left the tiny room where her aunt and uncle keep her locked up. Then one night, she has a series of dreams that show her the future, and learns that her true father could be a demonic grand duke. Knowing this, Mia plans to escape her room and ask the grand duke for child support so she can strike out on her own. But once they've met, her father isn't intent on letting her go so easily! Should Mia choose a life of independence or one with her newly found demon family?

---
I'm Mia, a child abused by my family. One day I had a 'dream' and saw the future. A future where I fell for my aunt and uncle's schemes, accidentally murdered my older half-brother, and causing a great war. Things just can't end like this, so I'll change the future with my own hands! 

With the information gathered from the dream, the first thing I have to do is find my biological father!

"Gimme thild thupport!"

(If only I didn't lisp!) In return for selling information about my uncle's schemes and taking all the backlog of child support from my biological father, I was planning on leaving…

But then my eldest brother, who boasts an aloof beauty, said, "I'm thinking of building you an amusement park."

My reckless second eldest brother interrupted and said, "Shall I buy you a tropical island covered with pretty flowers?"

And the most handsome man in the world, my Papa, replied on a whole nother level! "I'll buy you an artifact which calls for mermaids."

No, no, no! All three have terrible liquidity! The cleverest, smartest, most materialistic, devilish answer is… "Please make me a slide made of pure gold!"
description.ko:
"양유삐 주세요!(양육비 주세요!)"

외숙부와 이모에게 학대를 받으며 살던 미아. 어느 날, 그녀는 꿈 속에서 자신이 외숙부의 계략에 넘어가 친오빠를 살해하고, 세계 멸망을 일으키는 미래를 보게 된다.

이렇게 죽을 수는 없지! 미래는 내 손으로 바꾼다!

미아는 친부에게 외숙부의 흉계를 팔아 넘기고, 밀린 양육비에 정보 비용을 얹어서 청구하기로 결심하는데...

나는 제법 심각한 표정을 지으며 입을 열었다. 양손도 자랑스레 펼쳐 보인 채였다.

"샤다 샤. 그삐 정보에 단됸 천 골드! (싸다 싸. 극비 정보에 단돈 천 골드!)"

저기, 세계 멸망을 막을 정보 사실래요?

_

"꽃이 예쁘게 피는 열대 섬 하나 사줄까?"
아벨이 이렇게 말하자마자,

"섬에 아무것도 없으면 심심할테니 큰 오빠가 놀이동산을 하나 지어줄까 해."
카이옌 오빠가 끼어들고,

"나는 인어를 부르는 아티팩트를 사주마. 그게 있으면 밤새 인어의 노래를 들으며 놀 수 있을 거다."
아빠는 한 술 더 뜬다!

나는 영리하고 똑똑한 속물 악마답게 공손히 입을 열었다.

"미끄럼틀은 순금으로 만들어 주세요."

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
description.pt-br:
Mia cresceu sendo abusada por seu tio e tia. Um dia, em um sonho, ela vê um futuro que cai no esquema de seu tio e tia maternos, mata seu meio-irmão e causa uma grande guerra. Não pode acabar assim, o futuro está em minhas mãos! O primeiro passo nesse esforço é encontrar o pai que você conheceu em seu sonho!

“Dê-me uma carona!”

Em troca de vender as artimanhas do meu tio materno para o meu pai biológico, eu planejava sair com a pensão alimentícia e os custos de informação...
“Estou pensando em construir um parque de diversões.”

Quando o irmão mais velho, que se orgulha de nobre beleza, disse: “Você gostaria de me comprar uma ilha tropical com lindas flores?”

Meu segundo irmão não vai intervir, "Eu vou te comprar um artefato que chama uma sereia."

O pai mais bonito do mundo tem mais uma bebida! não! Todos os três são extremamente ruins para o dinheiro!!! A resposta diabólica do esnobe esperto e esperto é... “Faça o slide de ouro puro!”

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)

description.en:
Two lonely persons, two different fates. Him, a weak guy that suffers from albinism and permanent near-sighted. Her, an unwanted child, ostracized at school because she doesn't speak Vietnamese... In a twisted fate, they found themselves connected through Wi-Fi Network Names, but will their relationship last?

Omake arts done by [Flygombal](https://www.fiverr.com/zamrutzh)
Cover arts done by [Artiya](https://www.fiverr.com/kazisain)
description.vi: 2 con người F.A, 2 hoàn cảnh số phận hoàn toàn khác biệt. Thế mà chỉ vì tình cờ "giao tiếp" qua cái tên Wi-Fi ngẫu nhiên mà đến với nhau?

title.en: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru

altTitles.ja: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている

altTitles.id: Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak

altTitles.en: Marika's Love Meter Malfunction
Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.

altTitles.es-la: El Medidor De Afecto De Marika-San Esta Completamente Roto

altTitles.pt-br: O medidor de afeto da Marika-chan está completamente quebrado.

altTitles.vi: "Thang thiện cảm" Marika-chan bị hỏng mất rồi!

description.en:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
description.id:
Aku tiba-tiba bisa melihat tingkat rasa suka dari gadis yang kusukai.──Aku tidak punya keberanian untuk menyatakan cinta pada teman masa kecilku, Marika-chan. Suatu hari, aku membuat permohonan yang sangat kuat pada bintang jatuh: "Aku berharap bisa memahami perasaan orang lain, seperti di dalam game romansa." Dan ternyata, permohonan itu terkabul...!?

Di atas kepala para gadis di kelasku, muncul status bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka. Dalam kebingunganku melihat pemandangan aneh ini, aku memutuskan untuk memeriksa status barnya Marika-chan. Namun, status barnya justru melebihi batas, berubah menjadi status bar "neraka" yang benar-benar kacau...!?

Marika-chan, kalau kau tidak menyukaiku, kenapa kau begitu baik padaku...?
──Apa rahasia sebenarnya di balik sikap Marika-chan yang manis dan menggemaskan? Apakah dia benar-benar membenciku!? Atau mungkin sebenarnya...!?
description.ja:
あらすじ・内容
好きな子からの好感度が見えるようになりました。──幼馴染の茉莉花ちゃんに告白する勇気の無い僕。ある日、流れ星に強く願った「恋愛ゲームみたいに相手の気持ちがわかるようになりますように」すると、その願いは叶ってしまい…!?クラスの女子達に浮かぶ好感度メーター。非現実な光景に戸惑いながらも茉莉花ちゃんのを見に行くと、下限突破した地獄のメーターになっていて…!?茉莉花ちゃん、僕のこと嫌いなのにどうしてそんなに優しかったの…？――裏アリ可愛い茉莉花ちゃんの隠された本音は？本当にキライなの!?それとも…!?
description.pt-br:
Eu ganhei a habilidade de ver os níveis de afeição da garota de quem gosto. ──Eu não tenho coragem de confessar meus sentimentos à minha amiga de infância, Marika-chan. Um dia, fiz um desejo forte a uma estrela cadente: "Eu queria poder entender os sentimentos dos outros, como em um jogo de namoro." Então, esse desejo se tornou realidade...!?

Flutuando acima das garotas da minha turma estão medidores de afeição. Enquanto fico confuso com essa visão surreal, decido verificar o medidor da Marika-chan, apenas para descobrir que ele ultrapassou os limites, transformando-se em um medidor infernal...!?

Marika-chan, você não gosta de mim, então por que é tão gentil comigo...?
──Qual é a verdade oculta de Marika-chan por trás de sua fachada fofa? Ela realmente me odeia!? Ou é algo mais...?

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

altTitles.en: Appmon
Digimon Universe

altTitles.ja: デジモンユニバース アプリモンスターズ

description.en:
Everyone in the world uses smartphone apps. But inside them lurks unknown creatures called "Appli Monsters," or "Appmon." The Appmon are AI lifeforms with the ability to think and act, and exist in the boundary between the human world and digital space to allow people and the system to interface and function. But in the vast sea of the internet, the "last boss AI" Leviathan takes control of the Appmon with a virus and begins hacking every system, thus starting to control the human world from the world of the net.  
  
The protagonist, Haru Shinkai, is led to acquire the Appli Drive, and uses it to materialize Gacchimon, a search app monster. What is the secret hidden within the Appli Drive? What is the mysterious field that exists between net world where the Appmon exist, and the real world? What is the "App Combine" that can combine two Appmons? What is Leviathan's true goal?

altTitles.ja: かくれてイチャイチャシェアハウス！

description.en:
This is a story about two yuri couples in a shared house, who secretly flirt with one another without the other couple knowing.
- A cool, cute, simple-minded senpai x An energetic puppy kouhai
- A carefree gal senpai x A she-devil kouhai

Enjoy the sweet and affectionate interractions between these two couples!
description.ja:
シェアハウスをしている百合カップル2組が、お互いに内緒でこっそりいちゃいちゃするお話です。
・クールちょろかわ先輩×元気わんこ系後輩
・適当ギャル先輩×小悪魔系後輩
の2組の百合カップルのいちゃいちゃ、楽しんでね。

altTitles.ja: ひとり暮らしのOLを描きました

altTitles.en: I Drew An OL Who Lives Alone

description.en:
The life of a Japanese salaryman or OL (office lady) can be a thoroughly depressing one. Waking up early, working all day, staying out late for (mandatory) drinks with clients and coworkers, and then catching a few hours of sleep if you’re lucky, only to repeat it again and again and again.

This is the story of a "Single OL" and her pitiful lifestyle.
___
**Note:** Volume 5 is set as the final volume because Volume 6 contains entirely extra episodes.

altTitles.ja: 今日も来たんすか、依田先輩。

altTitles.en: Have You Come Again Today, Yoda-senpai?

altTitles.vi: Hôm nay chị lại tới nữa à, Yoda-senpai?

description.en: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
description.ja:
**ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！**

俺の実家で、我が家のようにくつろぐこの女。 同じ高校の先輩で、姉の友達の依田燈。 学校まで片道2時間らしく、ほぼ毎日俺の家に居座っている。 無防備で少し抜けてる依田先輩に振り回されて、ドキドキしっぱなし!! ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！

altTitles.ja: タダでは抱かれません

altTitles.id: Aku Gak Nidurin Kamu Secara Cuma-cuma

altTitles.th: ชีวิตพลิกผัน ฉันขายตัวให้เพื่อน

description.en: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
description.id: Kirishima Miyako, mahasiswa di sebuah universitas khusus wanita dan calon guru, adalah seorang gadis miskin yang menjalani hidup serba hemat. Suatu hari, setelah ditraktir oleh teman gadisnya Nakano Yui, dia diajak untuk mengunjungi ke love hotel. Namun, dia menolaknya karena enggan untuk berhubungan seks dengan temannya. Sampai kemudian, Yui menawarkannya 30.000 yen jika Miyako menerima ajakannya. Sejak saat itu, Miyako melakukan lebih banyak "transaksi" dengan teman-temannya yang lain dari universitasnya!? Kisahpun Yuri tentang persahabatan, uang dan seks pun dimulai.
description.th: คิริชิมะ มิยาโกะ สาวมหาลัยยาจกที่ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นครู ได้จับพลัดจับผลูไปเข้าโรงแรมม่านรูดกับเพื่อนซี้นามว่า นากาโนะ ยุย โดยเธอขอมีเซ็กส์ด้วยโดยแลกกับเงิน 30000 เยน! แบบนี้มีหรือมิยาโกะจะไม่เอา!

altTitles.en: Call the Name of the Night

description.en: Deep in the forest, a curious pair resides: a young girl Mira, whose affliction leads her to call forth darkness whenever she's in distress, and her physician Rei, determined to seek a cure. Each day, she works to remember the light and bring back the person she used to be. But a sudden visit from Rei's friend, who harbors an interest in Mira's illness, may be the end of their peaceful days…

altTitles.ja: フェイト／ステイナイト アンリミテッドブレイドワークス

description.en:
The Holy Grail War is a battle royale among seven magi who serve as Masters. Masters, through the use of the command seals they are given when they enter the war, command Heroic Spirits known as Servants to fight for them in battle. In the Fifth Holy Grail War, Rin Tosaka is among the magi entering the competition. With her Servant, Archer, she hopes to obtain the ultimate prize—the Holy Grail, a magical artifact capable of granting its wielder any wish.

One of Rin's classmates, Emiya Shirou, accidentally enters the competition and ends up commanding a Servant of his own known as Saber. As they find themselves facing mutual enemies, Rin and Shirou decide to form a temporary alliance as they challenge their opponents in the Holy Grail War.
description.ru: Манга адаптация рута Рин Тосаки Unlimited Blade Works - из визуальной новеллы Fate/Stay Night за авторством Дайсукэ Мориямы.
description.uk:
Війна за Святий Ґрааль – це королівська битва між сімома магами. Мастери використовуючи Командні Закляття, які вони отримують, коли вступають у війну, наказують героїчним духам, відомим як Сарванти, боротися за них у битві. У П'ятій Війні за Святий Ґрааль Тосака Рін є серед магів, які беруть участь у змаганні. Разом зі своїм слугою Арчером вона сподівається здобути головний приз – Святий Грааль, магічний артефакт, здатний виконати будь-яке бажання свого власника.

Один з однокласників Рін – Емія Шіро, випадково потрапляє на змагання і стає власником Сарванта на ім'я Сейбер. Опинившись перед обличчям спільних ворогів, Рін і Шіро вирішують створити тимчасовий альянс, щоб кинути виклик своїм супротивникам у Війні за Святий Грааль.

description.en:
Nueno Meisuke, better known as Nuubee, is an exorcist who also happens to be the teacher for a 5th grade class at Doumori Elementary. While he uses many various exorcism techniques, his main weapon is his left hand, the Demon's Hand, which has the power of a chaotic demon sealed within it.

The series follows Nuubee and Doumori Class 5-3 though the many weird, insane, and downright silly supernatural encounters they face.

description.en: Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.
description.ja:
不眠症に悩む高校二年生・半崎獏也はある日、深夜の公園でカップ焼きそばをおいしそうに食べる後輩少女・小比類巻君鳥と出会う。獏也がぐっすり眠れるよう手伝いをすると言う彼女は、自分の家に来てほしいといきなり提案してきて！？
「女子の部屋に入って、いきなりクンクンと匂いを嗅ぐなんて流石先輩ですね」「……せーんぱい。おっぱい見過ぎです」と、隙あらば獏也をおちょくる君鳥ちゃんから耳元でエッチな言葉を囁かれたり添い寝したりと長い夜を過ごすことになり――！
description.vi: Bakuya a.k.a Lariat-senpai là một học sinh cao trung năm hai bị chứng mất ngủ. Một đêm, cậu gặp Kimidori, một cô gái năm nhất học cùng trường trong công viên. Cô tự nhận mình có thể chữa bệnh mất ngủ cho Bakuya, nhưng lại trêu chọc cậu mỗi khi có cơ hội.
description.es-la: Bakuya, un estudiante de segundo de bachillerato que padece insomnio, sin embargo, una noche conoce a Kimidori, una chica de tercero que le gusta comer fideos yakisoba de taza. Kimidori dice que puede ayudar a Bakuya a dormir, no obstante, le gusta gastarle bromas cada vez que ella tiene la oportunidad.

altTitles.vi: Dũng Sĩ Bị Bóc Lột Đến Cùng Cực, Được Ma Vương Chiêu Mộ Với Đãi Ngộ Hậu Hĩnh ~ Dù Đứng Đầu Bảng Xếp Hạng Anh Hùng Nhưng Lương Bổng Chẳng Đủ Sống Qua Ngày ~

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.
description.ja:
無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…
・絶え間ない魔王討伐命令
・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

もう、我慢の限界!!

そんな金欠勇者に魔王から救いの手が!? 超好待遇のスカウトにアレンの選択は――
description.vi:
rong thời đại có rất nhiều anh hùng và ma vương này, có một anh hùng ứng đầu bảng xếp hạng và có danh hiệu "mạnh nhất''. Đó là dũng sĩ Allen. Người anh hùngmajnh nhất, được mọi người công nhận, đạt được địa vị và danh dự, và cuộc sống của anh ta thật suôn sẻ...

"Có cái củ chuối ấy!"

Những nhiệm vụ diệt trừ ma vương được đưa ra liên tục. Ngay cả khi tôi cố gắng hết sức để đánh bại một ma vương mạnh mẽ, cũng chỉ nhận được một số tiền mà ngay cả một người bình thường cũng có thể dễ dàng kiếm được, chưa bao gồm các chi phí khác. Tôi phải tự chi trả cho các cuộc thám hiểm, không đến nỗi tệ, nhưng cũng không thể tiếp tục sống như vậy. Sau cùng,  anh ấy đã đối đầu với ma vương của số phận. Một nữ quỷ xinh đẹp đã đưa ra đề xuất cho người anh hùng đang bất mãn.

"Dũng sĩ! Hãy làm việc cho tôi với những điều kiện sau!"

Những phúc lợi đầy hứa hẹn đó đã làm tôi lay động.

altTitles.ja: 孤高の人

altTitles.en: The Climber

description.en: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.
description.ru:
В старшей школе Северной Ёкосуки новый, необычный ученик – Мори Бунтаро. В первый же день он отдает предпочтение крыше здания, чем ее кабинетам, где со всех сторон сыплются расспросы. Чтобы отвязаться от надоедливых одноклассников, лихо спрыгивающих с карниза вниз по веревке, Мори совершает безумный поступок: без страховки забирается на крышу по трубе, да еще в таком месте, где это достаточно проблематично, даже для тренированного человека! Одноклассник Миямото и Ониси-сенсей в ужасе и восторге, ведь они профессиональные скалолазы, а тут появляется такой способный ученик! Но Мори не разделяет их восторга и не принимает помощи. Нелюдимый и гордый, он всего добивается в одиночку, и трудности скалолазания его не пугают. Он собирается покорять вершину за вершиной, с каждый разом поднимаясь все выше.   
  
Note: Sakamoto Shinichi did both the story and the art from Volume 4 onwards.  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Delcourt](https://www.editions-delcourt.fr/mangas/series/serie-ascension)
description.uz: Yangi o'rta maktabga ko'chib o'tganining birinchi kuni Mori Buntaru ismli yolg'iz o'quvchini sinfdoshi ko'ndirib maktab binosiga ko'tariladi. Bir xato qadam uni o'limga olib kelishi mumkinligini bilsa ham, u oldinga siljiydi va nihoyat cho'qqiga chiqqandan so'ng, Mori qoniqish hissini boshdan kechiradi. O‘sha tuyg‘u, go‘yo unga: “Sen tiriksan!” qoyaga chiqish uchun adrenalin tug'diradi.

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

意外穿成为了帝国最声名鼎盛的第一家族的私生女。虽然蒂亚头脑出众，也积累了大量的实战经验，但最终在爷爷去世后被叔叔扫地出门，而无能的叔叔很快便败光了家族的产业…… 意外死亡后，又一次重新回了小时候——这一世，蒂亚决定成为家主，重新让家族站上帝国巅峰！

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

description.en:
Akashi Eito has failed miserably on all high school admissions exams but somehow, he receives a letter of acceptance from a school he does not remember applying for. He nevertheless happily enrolls, expecting to live the ideal school life, but his aspiration are quickly destroyed as he discovers that this mysterious school is a training institution for secret agents!   
  
Immediately, Eito wants to return home and live a normal life with his normal family, until the director of the school makes a shocking revelation: Eito's deceased father was also a secret agent! He subsequently wants to know more about the past and memories of his father, so he decides to stay in this school. However, as a student of this institution, Eito will have to face a deadly exam made to test the skills of all new students…  
  
Follow this story of action and espionage, in which our hero, who lacks physical strength, compensates for it with great bravery, and captivates everyone around him with the power of his courage and friendship!!
description.es-la: Eight es un chico que anhela tener una vida escolar de ensueño, para ello aplica varios exámenes para ingresar a cualquier escuela. Con todo esto, Eight no logra ingresar a ninguna escuela , excepto a una escuela a la que él no recuerda haber hecho el examen de ingreso, más tarde al llegar esta escuela descubrirá un mundo de super personas con ideales y habilidades fuera de lo común.

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

description.en:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

altTitles.ja: ユメかウツツか

description.en: The main character, Iroha, is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though it’s been about two months since she started high school, she still hasn’t had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break, she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior, who is a year older, has become a source of support for Iroha. However, the two of them share a secret...
description.es: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...
description.fr: Iroha, le personnage principal, est un lycéen de première année qui a du mal à parler aux autres. Bien que deux mois se soient écoulés depuis son entrée au lycée, elle n'a encore jamais eu de véritable conversation avec l'un de ses collègues de classe. Durant la récréation, il sort de la classe en cachette et se rend dans la cour de récréation située à côté de l'ancien bâtiment scolaire. Elle le fait pour rencontrer un élève de terminale qu'elle a rencontré à la bibliothèque municipale alors qu'elle étudiait pour ses examens. Cet étudiant, qui a un an de plus qu'elle, est devenu une source de soutien pour Iroha. Cependant, toutes deux partagent un secret...
description.ja: 主人公は他人と会話することが苦手な高校1年生・いろは。高校入学から約2カ月、いまだクラスの人とまともに話せない彼女は、休み時間のたびに教室を抜け出しては旧校舎側の中庭に向かう。その目的とは、受験勉強をしているときに町の図書館で出会った1つ年上の先輩と話すこと。先輩との交流を支えに日々を過ごすいろはだが、2人にはある秘密があって……。

description.en:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)
description.fr:
Dans un monde fantasy où l'avenir de chacun est déterminé par les "skills" révélés durant l'enfance, la jeune Ivy se voit attribuer le métier de dresseuse de monstres au rang le plus bas qui soit : sans-étoile. Rejetée par son village, elle entame alors un voyage aux côtés de Sora, un slime tout faible, seul monstre qu'elle ait réussi à apprivoiser.
La plus faible des dresseuses et le plus faible des monstres parviendront-ils à survivre dans ce monde rude et sans pitié... ?
description.ja: スキル上主義の異世界。気弱で優しい魔物使い《テイマー》に転生した少女・アイビーは星なしの最弱ランクがために命を狙われ、生きるために旅に出る。道中唯一テイムできたのは最弱の崩れスライム「ソラ」最弱同士の２人（匹）には魔物がはびこる異世界は過酷……と思いきや＿＿？

description.en:
Fiona, the most powerful magician in the empire, was tired of being overworked on the battlefield every day, both physically and emotionally. She thought she had given up her life on the battlefield, but when she woke up, she found herself under the protection of Matthias, the most powerful knight in the enemy kingdom!

In this powerful and loving fantasy, Fiona recovers her life while receiving love and tenderness for the first time!

It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

description.en:
Kate Smith enjoys her quiet life as a maid and has no interest in getting married. Her resolve only deepens as she watches her peers swoon over the moody manservant, Ian. Whether it's fate or bad luck, Kate quickly finds herself in a series of compromising encounters with him. One day another maid goes missing and the mystical happenings that follow only intensify her suspicions about Ian. As the expert detective Jade Killian comes into town, can he help her uncover the truth?

---
Kate is a maid at the Baron's estate in Muiella, a country where warlocks and witches are shunned. One day, the new servant Ian arrives… but he's much too proper and handsome for his lowly rank. As they keep running into each other, Kate's suspicion of Ian's disarming demeanor only grows when strange incidents crop up in the manor. Sleuthing for the truth, the wellbeing of the estate and its residents may be at stake! Where's a good detective when you need one?!

---

description.fr:
Simple deomestique dans un manoir à la campagne, elle ne pensait pas se retrouver mêlée à un mystère. Alors qu’elle ne désire qu’avoir une petite vie tranquille, la visite d’un enquêteur au manoir et l’arrivée d’un valet mystérieux vont bouleverser son petit quotidien. La disparition d’une de ses amies va la pousser à enquêter sur les mystères entourant le manoir...

---
Kate est une domestique dans un manoir à Muiella, une contrée où les gens dotés de pouvoirs magiques sont rejetés. Un jour, Ian, un nouveau domestique arrive… Mais il est bien trop impeccable et élégant pour un simple servant.

Les soupçons de Kate quant au comportement désarmant de Ian ne font que grandir à mesure que d’étranges incidents se produisent dans le manoir.

La recherche de la vérité pourrait bien mettre tous les résidents en danger! Où trouver un bon détective quand on en a besoin?!

---

description.ko:
마법사와 마녀를 배척하는 나라. 뮈엘라.
뮈엘라의 시골 영지 알라나데일의 저택에서 하녀로 일하는 케이트.

어느 날, 그녀가 일하는 데일 남작가에 수상한 하인이 들어온다.

하인에 어울리지 않는 훤칠한 키에 단정한 외모를 가진 그는 첫날부터 주목을 받지만,
케이트는 사사건건 자신과 부딪치는 이안이 마음에 들지 않는다.

한편 그녀가 몸담은 데일 남작가에 불길한 사건들이 하나둘 일어나기 시작하는데…….

title.en: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: マルチバースの私、恋していいですか?

altTitles.en: Is It Alright for My Multiverse Self to Fall in Love?

altTitles.vi: Em của đa vũ trụ có thể yêu anh được không?

altTitles.ja: マル恋

description.en:
Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. 

One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. 

But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets."

When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?
description.ja:
本当なら出逢えていなかった、私とあなた。好きだと言わなくても後悔はしない？

可能性を切り拓く、マルチバースラブコメ読切！

altTitles.en: Past Life Relationship

description.en:
"I was a Queen from the Joseon Dynasty who was murdered by the royal consort?!"

Kim Minju, who suddenly remembered her past life while taking an exam. 

She was very confused when she remembered but tried to calm down because the most important thing was her college entrance examination and not her previous 
life. But the Consort, who was her enemy in the past life came to find Minju. 
And soon after, even the King who was her husband in the past life appears in front of her and puts her student life into a crisis. 

"I don't care about the past life or whatever, just please let me study!"
description.ko:
'내가 후궁에게 살해당한 조선의 왕비?!'
시험을 보다가 갑자기 전생을 떠올리게 된 민주.
크게 당황하지만, 전생보다 중요한 것은 대입이었기에 애써 마음을 추스른다.
하지만 전생의 철천지 원수였던 후궁이 민주를 찾아오고
뒤이어 전생에 남편이었던 왕까지 나타나면서 민주의 수험생활은 위기를 맞는데....
'전생이고 나발이고 제발 공부 좀 하자!!'

description.vi:
“Tôi muốn cậu trở thành nguồn cảm hứng của tôi!”

Hai con người với những đam mê cháy bỏng nhưng lạc lối trong chính câu chuyện của riêng mình. Một cách tình cờ, họ đã gặp được nhau.

Ở cạnh nhau, Yuji và Masa, hai con người yêu cái đẹp, được sống là chính mình. Cùng niềm đam mê quá đỗi đặc biệt họ dần khám phá ra những cảm xúc chôn giấu và điều sẽ thay đổi cuộc đời của họ mãi mãi.

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.
